content.detailedDescription:
Lunch time, a fine day with no cloud at any level. my wife and i were in our garden having lunch. my wife drew my attention to a luminescent orb at what i would estimate to be 4,500/5000 feet which was moving from e to w due n of us; there was no sound, or con- trail. 
within some ten seconds, a precisely similar orb appeared from the nw heading sw at the same altitude. again no sound, or con- trail. their speeds appeared to be those of a single engine light aircraft eg: a cessna say 80/100 knots.
when they were say 500 metres apart, the moved into a precise rotation maintaining their distance in a circle of that diameter. they undertook some 7/10 rotations without stopping, or apparant change in velocity.

it was quite clear they were under intelligent control.

following the rotations, they simply broke their formation one heading due s, the other nw.

their departure speed increased after after some 10 seconds and increased to what i would estimate to be say three to four times their joining speed. the speeds of both increased after another five, six seconds, not dramatically and they simply disappeared from view as they increased range.

i have flown as a reserve officer in the royal air force and privately since 1966 with power and gliding licences and feel confident the above description is accurate in terms of speeds, altitude and headings.

i believe similar orb sightings were reported in the uk around this period and one, or two videos my wife and i have seen have been very similar to our experience on that day.
content.summary: Two orbs 'formated' ,different approach direction to converge into rotation around each other then parted opposite direction.

content.detailedDescription:
My husband and i went out on the back deck to take a closer look of jupiter and the moon. it was really bright and beautiful. i decided to take my cell phone and take pictures of it to post on facebook. when i reviewed my pictures, i noticed the one "star" had changed positions and moved down clockwise around the moon. i also noticed the "red" star at the top position disappeared. these pictures were snapped within minutes of each other. 

i used google photos to put the 3 images together as an animated gif, and was surprised to clearly the object moving around the moon.
content.summary: I took pics of jupiter and the moon and realized that i caught something on camera. the observed object changed positions and one disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
Bright formation of lights that changed formation and shape. 
discovered in photos taken on february 8, 2016 on the grounds of cachoeira seca in camburiú in santa catarina brazil.
content.summary: Bright formation of lights that changed formation and shape.

content.altitude: 500 Feet or Less, Over 500 Feet (under cloudcover)
content.detailedDescription: My buddy and i were going to watkins glen from odessa around 10pm on june 20 2014 approximately. we saw a glowing red object moving above the tree line over the swamp so we pulled over n watched it for maybe 3 -5 mins. it moved over the swamp and across the road we were on and began to climb higher in the sky n in the blink of an eye there was a small flash n it was gone. i didn't know what to think i was shaking and nervous but at the same time excited.
content.summary: Looked like a huge  glowing red boomerang

content.detailedDescription:
I was outside with my dog around 6:30 pm and went along the main road heading south east. i noticed some lights over the fields in the west / south west. i saw two fast light balls that had a white center with blue and green lights around it, flickering in a fast and random rhythm. the lights were just a couple hundred meters away from me. my flashlight reaches about 350 meters and they appeared to be at the very end of my light beam.

first i thought that these were two bikers with headlamps, but one of the lights was moving way too fast for a bicycle. it kind of "shot" to the left (south), changed it's direction and "shot" to the other light (north) after which both lights kept moving northwards. 

while i observed these two objects i could make some comparisons. in the backgound i could see cars driving with a speed of about 70 to 100 km/h (40 - 60 mp/h). moreover, we live in the approach path of the near by airport (cologne) and even planes that are still flying with several hundreds km/h only a few hundred meters above our heads appear to be slower than these two lights. 

after the lights went northwards i hurried to get home and tried to see them again from our balcony (free visibility across the fields over which i saw the lights) but unfortunately they were gone already.

i tried to see them again (in case it would have been bicycles they might have appeared again) but they didn't come back.
content.summary: Flickering, color changing & fast moving lights

content.detailedDescription: I was looking out my bedroom window toward  ne direction when i spotted what i thought was an airplane moving slowly but after watching for a minute i realized that the object was moving way to slow for an airplane. the object then stopped and hovered for a few minutes,then ascended slowly behind a large cloud and disappeared. the color was a grey/silver color and shaped like a disc with a dome on top. it differently was neither a plane or helicopter.This happened at around 5:00pm pst.At first i was shocked and then excited.I have also observed on two separate occasions from my house at night looking toward some hills to the east orbs hovering and moving at extreme speed in different directions. i reported these sightings also.I think this world as we've known it is changing rapidly and people of our planet need to informed and alert to as what is going on. things are escalating  everyday it's interesting times we live in.I'm going to keep my android with me to hopefully get some pictures.
content.flightPath: Hovering then path,Path with directional change,Path then hovering
content.summary: Observed disc shaped ufo moving slowly between two layers of large white fluffy clouds, stopped, hovered then disappeared into clouds.

I was outside with my dog around 6:30 pm and went along the main road heading south east. i noticed some lights over the fields in the west / south west. i saw two fast light balls that had a white center with blue and green lights around it, flickering in a fast and random rhythm. the lights were just a couple hundred meters away from me. my flashlight reaches about 350 meters and they appeared to be at the very end of my light beam.

i tried to see them again (in case it would have been bicycles they might have appeared again) but they didn't come back.
content.summary: Flickering, color changing & fast moving lights

content.detailedDescription: Driving home from l.A. sightseeing in hollywood, on out trip home was quite uneventful...Until we were somewhere in the diablo grande driving north on interstate 5 (i-5) when i inadvertantly mentioned how beautiful the sunset was, in response my wife gets my phone and takes a picture then notices after taking the photo that there was a strange anomoly..So we look to the sky to confirm our findings and we witnessed the exact same shape for not more than 30 seconds when it dispersed, dissappeared, disintigrated...Not sure what word to use there.  anyways maybe someone can explain or debunk our curiosity into what we witnessed!
content.summary: Me and wife saw undescribable cloud formation that lasted just over a minute then dissappeared

content.detailedDescription: About 0030 had smoke. windy night saw many clouds moving but one standing still. it is there right now, i just checked, 0121. one cloud covering moon appeared to have two vortex coming off it going up. the vortex moved with this cloud approaching the stationary cloud and the vortex seemed to bow over the stationary cloud. that cloud has long since past and the stationary cloud is still there. i have no idea, it could be a cloud in a vacuum, or no wind current hitting it by chance. i do know about an hour has gone by and this "cloud" is still there on this very windy night. it looks like a grey cloud with white edges due to moonlight directly near it to its' north. for all i know it is just a cloud but thought it odd it is not moving while all the other clouds are moving south. i do not own a picture taking phone, shame. it is big. i can give dimensions based on the trees and building as far as width and girth but am guessing distance from me less than a half mile.
content.summary: Looks like a cloud. hovering there now. much wind other clouds moving

content.detailedDescription: Taking out garbage saw bright orange light. the list ght was very usual never have seen anything like this especially in this location. i watch it come from the west then it stopped proceeded north at this time i grabbed my wife and then five more appeared one after another. they started to go straight up and slowly disappear. except one it produced a large bright white light and disappeared in a flash.  then we witnessed two more flashes of bright lights and one took off north and resembled what a satellite looks like in the night sky until out of sight. it's light changed from orange to white like a satellite...
content.summary: Taking out garbage saw bright orange light. light was very usual never have seen anything like this especially in this location. watch it come from the west then it stopped proceeded north then five more appeared one after another

content.detailedDescription:
1.Sightseeing 
2. reviewed my iphone pictures and noticed objects
3. taking pictures of surroundings (sightseeing purposes)
4.  several ufo's hovering in the skyline near port of boston
5.  very surprised and astonished after reviewing pictures 
6.   never saw objects until i reviewed my pictures
content.summary: Did not notice until i looked at my iphone pictures

content.detailedDescription: Possible hybrid in mainstream media( cant miss it) if you could forward this to dr. birnes sure would appreciate it, with any forwarding info, great web site?
content.summary: Media

content.detailedDescription: While visiting relatives in florida, i stepped outside to smoke a cigarette. i looked up into the sky to the east and observed three red lights in the distance  moving ese to wnw. my  initial thought was that it was a formation of airplanes. they moved toward.My location and two were then obstructed by a tree. i watched the third object just disappear at about 40 degrees i then looked back to the east and saw two more of these red star like lights moving in the same manner and direction. one disappeared beind the same tree, and the other just disappeared at about 55 degrees. at this time i went into the residence and called my wife and her mom to come outside to see these lights. we all observed 4 or 5 more of these lights  moving the same way. three or four disappeared behind the tree and never came out the other side. we observed one just vanish at about 75 degrees. i was excited because it looked like something i had no explanation for. the lights were bright red and did not flash.
content.summary: I observed 8-10 star like red objects,flying silently from ese to www. they all vanished before reaching overhead.

content.detailedDescription:
Appalachian 9-ball
report for mufon by glenn green

	throughout this investigation new video data came in every week and is still very robust. an external hard drive is still recording events and awaits study. lorna, the witness has given the first original security system back to the original security system installers. a complete copy of the hard drive is forthcoming. a special coded block made it nearly impossible to record and copy on our own after two weeks attempting to do so. a full 3 months’ worth of recording on all 4 cameras presented a mountain of material to be watched. without the dealer installer codes her swann system would only allow for 2 hours at a time of research.

	lorna’s new security system has 6 cameras and cost a lot more money. the second system has yielded 6 of 9 categories that i have observed. an external hard drive was set up by mufon and we anxiously await to see more events.

	i will briefly list the 9 categories of events we identified.
1.	the original spheres – event.
2.	beehive like cylinder shape – event.
3.	upside down shaped icicles. 
4.	parabolic shape cloud structures – event.
5.	bottom triangles (2 dimensional) – event.
6.	residual fluorescence of back lawn – event.
7.	2 solids chasing each other. – event.
8.	distant circular still light – event.
9.	high speed right to left moving spheres (incredible speeds) – event.

	since lorna did want more investigation; i hope to get more data very soon. her and her husband were camera shy and often sick, so in order to get a report into mufon i agreed to formally interview her over the phone, which went really well. the two times i went up to their house they were visibly scared and rushed me out both times. i did get rock samples, soil samples, and even tree branch samples that were a few feet away from the original spherical event.

	lorna and i developed a very close relationship revolved around the approximately 50 hours of phone time we racked up. she called me more than i called her. she very quickly trusted me, and i reduced her fear of the events in play. she would send me videos often and i would always call her right back and talk about the new video. she was always intelligent and very believable. to show you how well our relationship is – she actually called me the day after the phone interview to tell me i was doing a good job on the case. she also wanted to add that at times certain cameras would “go out” and then magically turn on. i always asked her what she thought different things were about. lorna has gotten much less fearful and is now wanting to know answers.

	she lives in a remote area of northeastern new jersey; an area with 17 lakes, many of which have had ufo reports associated with them. from her back porch, you can see part of the appalachian trail, and on a good night you can play appalachian 9 ball.

on further investigations
•	birds are mainly ruled out on this case.
          hummingbirds left the area to migrate to south west united states early in september.
	eagles are too big.
	vultures are too big.
	big black birds are too big; and not many of them are in this area in new jersey. 

•	the scole experiment in italy dealt with similar phenomena. thusly showing the same phenomena on two different continents. two of the images on the scole website were identical to the images picked up on the hard drive from the witnesses.
•	i would like to try and capture at least one of the spheres on two different cameras, from different angles at once.
•	this would be great and easy to set up.
•	i would also like to capture images from the woods around their house towards their house, for a two hour period at night. lorna and i agree; that one to three in the morning would be a peak time period. (i could use my sony nightshot mode also.)
•	also, my sony outdoor has great audio, which i could pick up for two hours straight. inside their house, they never heard anything.
•	at this point, all six cameras have had at least one event happen.
•	the diversity of the data is starting to show patterns.
•	the data may be even showing intelligent thought.
•	i have complete rock, foliage and soil samples which i would like to have tested.
•	although they (the witnesses) are hesitant, i am ready to rf and elf test as soon as possible. (i have a meter ready to go.)
•	around their house exists a horseshoe shaped natural rock sculpture that is striking in size and composition. most of it actually is quite old looking and black. this property structure is another candidate for rf and elf readings.
content.summary: Spheres observed on security cameras.

content.detailedDescription:
I was standing in my backyard when i looked up to the sky and noticed an object that was at a very high altitude, yet very bright, flying directly overhead. it was heading south-west, and had a contrail behind it. the contrail, however, was erratic and not straight as normally observed from an airplane. the object was moving quite fast, and within roughly 5-10 seconds, the object disappeared without seeming to lose elevation. 

at first, i thought it was a high-altitude airplane, but the speed and the fact that it disappeared so quickly made me think otherwise.
content.summary: Very high altitude object with erratic contrail seemingly disappeared.

content.detailedDescription:
I was sitting at the dining table with my wife and daughters who were 8 & 6 years old at the time. it was daylight, suppertime say around 6 pm in the early summer - june i think. i suddenly felt a strange electric-like energy, maybe like if you like if you were near an electrical transformer or something like that. it was enough to make get up quickly from the table and instinctively go outside. our dog was outside and barking for no apparent reason. i looked up to the eastern sky and saw 3 distinct lights in a slightly triangular horizontal pattern, with the middle light appearing to be just slightly higher than the ones to the right and left. 
the lights seemed to be moving rapidly away from me to the east. within seconds, maybe less than a second, the lights seem to converge and disappear. during this time i felt the strange sense of energy that i felt when i first felt it in the house. i never saw the shape or outline of an object. i flt as if i had actually seen what i saw and in no way could i explain it to myself as any kind of normal aircraft. when i went back in i asked my wife and kids if they felt or saw anything. as i recall, they didn't seem to have felt or seen whati did as much as i did. my yougest daughter (6 1/2 year old) then said she saw a plane or something like a plane. i asked her to draw a picture of it, and she did.
she drew a picture of an craft similar to an airplane, from a top, side view, with windows along the side, wings on either side, and as i recall there were people figures in the windows. i think i still have the drawing somewhere, as i remember keeping it with her school memorabilia -pictures, drawings etc- as she went through grade school and then high scool. she is now 32 years old and lives in dallas where she is an elementary school teacher. i plan to ask her what she remembers about this event the next time she visits home, or if i visit with her this spring. 
thats about it. i had thought about rprting this many times but the demands of work, raising a family, etc, always seemed to take priority.
as i recall this event it comes back as a distinct sensation of a burst of energy - almost pulsatingly so, like electricity. and i can still envision the 3 lights disappearing to the east. i have often wondered if other people reported anything simiilar in the area during that time frame of the late 1980's to early 1990s. after this event i semmed to notice more strange lights in the night sky, but wasnt sure if they were just airplanes, satellites or other man - made craft.  
thank you for your time in considering this report.
content.summary: 3 lights in eastern sky, electrical sensation, lights rapidly  converged and disappeared

content.detailedDescription: Has anybody reported seeing this beam of light in the sky?   it was visible until about 6:45 am this morning, not sure what time it originated, i first saw it at 6:30 to the nw of pedricktown, nj.  the center of the beam was the most intense and tapers off at the top and towards the bottom.  pulsated until it disappeared around 6:45 am.
content.summary: Beam of light in the sky

content.detailedDescription: I was at out side of my home. i'm watching at sky as a habit. i saw a blue and white straight line going across the sky. even though i saw it i couldn't recognize what is it. because it was disapeared in 4 or 5 seconds.
content.summary: It was a white and blue straight line across the sky i'm sure it wasn't a lightning. it was disappeared in 4 or 5 seconds

content.detailedDescription: Investigator witnessed a single red orb traveling about 500 - 600 feet above ground over 34th and slide, it quickly grew into multiple orbs (17) and formed a triangle and continued flying se at 25 - 30 knots. i had initiated a ce-5 protocol and it seems as if this was my closest encounter so far. i have been watching and filming the past few weeks and have begun initiatives to make this a majority part of my life, since i am only 17 it made me feel quite lucky and fascinated that i had encountered 17 lights, i recommend everyone to try and watch over lubbock as it has become a major hot-spot. the night of the sighting i had made previous videos in my home and took the camera to prove it all. as i have gotten many weird orbs and craft on film, this close and highly illuminated triangle would not show up... even with my iso set to 800 and aperature exposure to be quick, it wouldn't catch or show on my dslr. i had weird vibrations and i felt connected ton this object, i lost sight of it when it moved to south and the tress started to cover it on my street. again... lubbocks becoming a hotspot every night and i encourage more interaction with the new lubbock lights.
content.summary: Investigator witnessed a single red orb multiply's into 17 and then fly into triangular formation at about 25 knots going se .

content.detailedDescription:
Driving home from a sports lounge when i noticed a bright light in my side mirror. at this time i was heading south so i thought it was someone behind me with their high beams on so i didn't pay any attention to it until i reached 50st intersection.

as the light got brighter (closer) i started to worry, that's when i got this feeling over power me. as this light got closer, the more scared i became. it was a feeling like i had no control, like something bad was about to happen and i couldn't do anything. i knew something bad was about to happen but yet i couldn't drive or move from that position. 

as this feeling passed through me, that's when the humming started. an almost low bass, so deep and low that it literal felt like it was under my seat. i closed my eyes with fright, i imagined closing my eyes, then opening them and finding myself waking up at home on the couch in front of the tv like it was a bad dream.

when i did open my eyes, my life was changed forever. 

i just hit a 14yr old girl. the humming sound was the defibulator trying to restart the young girls heart.

the light i noticed was the ambulance rushing to the scene. all of this happened subconcouisly. i was to drunk to drive..

now i'm in jail serving a 22yr sentence. my life has changed
content.summary: it has just changed my life......... bright lights

content.detailedDescription:
I was patrolling the area of walmart, and looked up and saw the triangle craft. when i first saw the craft i knew right off what it was,the object was bright having only 3 lights. it moved slowly for about several seconds and then just disappeared.My actions was i motioned the people to drive from the stop sign, i couldn't believe what i was seeing and last i kept my eyes on the object.
the triangle craft just vanished in the night sky.
content.summary: I looked in the sky and  saw this triangle 3 lights craft hovering above walmart store.

content.detailedDescription: My husband was in the yard and saw the first ufo. it was large and fuzzy and glowing orange moving at a high rate of speed. he ran in to get me. i ran outside and saw a second ufo followed closely by a third. they glowed orange and were much larger than the stars. they were traveling very fast east to west. the third ufo pasted the second one half way across the sky. they seemed to stop and then they circled each other and then both vanished. my husband is a pilot and we are sure it was not a plane.
content.summary: 3 separate crafts.1 alone, then 2 together. traveling fast, then stopped and circled each other. then disappeared.

content.detailedDescription: I was driving and i looked up in the sky. it's cloudy out here right now, and immediately i noticed a bright light in the sky. initially i thought it was an airplane, because it was flashing, but i then realized there was only one light. i'm watching this thing, it blinks a light, and then goes back to dark. then it lights up again, the only thing is it traveled a great distance. i'm not sure what the distance is, but i know it moved for sure. i watched it travel across the whole visible sky in about ten seconds, and then it flashes again, and it makes a complete 90 degree turn and starts going in the other direction. i only saw it blink one more time before it went behind a section of trees and disappeared. initially i felt odd. kind of a feeling of just confusion, and as i watched it the feeling became more and more strange until the unknown object disappeared. i wasn't physically affected, and there was no missing time.
content.summary: I saw a flashing light and realized as it flashed it traveled a great distance

content.detailedDescription: Standing on porch having cigarette and noticed an odd light to my left. i just ask for video to be further analyzed to rule out all anomalies.
content.summary: Strange circle entity that looked like a doughnut and omitted orange, red, and yellow glow.

content.detailedDescription: I was down in sacramento hanging around my cousins house with three other people including my cousin when we all noticed what looked like a very bright star roughly 40-50 feet up. we walked closer to the object but it was just hovering pulsating many colors on first look it was an aircraft but as we got closer the object looked more like a triangle hovering in the sky with no sound no wind nothing to signify that it was an aircraft the object then began to move at a very slow speed still with no sound and nothing being moved around do to wind. the aircraft then disappeared from sight and we all began speculating on what the object was.
content.summary: Object was hovering in one spot pulsating many colors for about 20 min then took off with no sound

content.detailedDescription: I was stopped at a traffic light, talking on the phone when i noticed a super bright, glowing, disk shaped object approaching on the horizon. it was a very cloudy day and the object was flying just under the cloud cover. i described the entire event to my friend that i was talking with on the phone. what was so unusual about the object was the way the entire disk shaped object was glowing. there were no individual lights on this object, rather the entire object glowed like a white fluorescent light. the out line of the object was fuzzy. it continued flying closer to me, just under the cloud cover and eventually turned and ascended into the clouds, at which point i lost track of the object and never saw it again. the object did not fly unusually fast, or make any unusually sharp turns. what made this object unusual was the way it was glowing. the entire siting was no more than 20 seconds. i did park in a parking lot and continue to watch the general area where i last saw the glowing object. no more than 5 minutes after the object ascended into the the cloud cover, a black helicopter came from the same general area and flew right over the top of my parked car. the helicopter had a very crisp outline and individual lights that were very obviously lights. both the helicopter and the brightly illuminated disk shaped object were over joint base elmendorf richardson (jber). i was curious about the glowing object because i had never seen anything illuminated like this object before. other than curiosity and excitement over seeing something so different than ever before i was unaffected.
content.summary: Bright luminescent disk appeared on the horizon and ascended into the cloud cover over jber
